metadata.title: Why Is Not the Threshold Etc. Displayed in Status Monitor?

sections.content:
Question:
The reference value and the touch judgment threshold value are not displayed in Status monitor. What are the possible causes?
Answer:
In Workbench 6, if the TS terminal being monitored is a TS terminal that constitutes a slider or wheel, the
Touch Decision Thresholds are not displayed.
In QE for Capacitive Touch, they are displayed in CapTouch Board Monitor (QE) and CapTouch Parameter List (QE).
Workbench6 is now in maintenance status, and we do not plan to update it in the future.
Use QE for Capacitive Touch as a support tool for developing a modern capacitive touch sensor.
QE for Capacitive Touch can be downloaded from URL below.
https://www.renesas.com/qe-capacitive-touch
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
